title: Stefano Bonaccini - Wikipedia
snippet: Stefano Bonaccini (Italian pronunciation: [ˈsteːfano bonatˈtʃiːni]; born 1 January 1967) is an Italian politician and member of the Democratic Party (PD), of which he is serving as president since 12 March 2023. In 2024, he was elected to the European Parliament to represent North-East Italy.

title: Stefano Bonaccini
snippet: Stefano Bonaccini (born 1 January 1967) is an Italian social-democratic politician and member of the Democratic Party (PD), currently serving as the party's national president and as a Member of the European Parliament.[1][2] He previously held ...

title: PD elects two women deputy chairs - English - ANSA.it
snippet: (ANSA) - ROME, MAR 12 - The Democratic Party (PD) on Sunday elected two women deputy chairs to serve under new chair Stefano Bonaccini and new secretary Elly Schlein, the centre-left opposition party's first woman leader and youngest ever at 37.
